bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with high modulus fibers, Dyad Plus lay-up, Tri/TT frame, NACA compliant profiles, chainstay-mounted rear brake, internal cable routing, integrated seat post clamp design, seat tube with full rear wheel recess, flat-oval top tube, aerofoil seatstays, PressFit 30 BB shell, rear-entry horizontal dropouts with axle-position adjustment bolts

components.description: Windshield aero full carbon with rear-facing/enclosed front brake for reduced aerodynamic drag, with brake pad adjustment ports
Alex RA30 aero rim, 20/24H, 30mm aero rim profile, Formula alloy hubs with QR and Formula bladed stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Slick, 700x23c (Vittoria Rubino 650x23c for XS)
Shimano Ultegra RD- 6700 rear and 105 FD-5700 braze-on front
FSA Gossamer double with Press Fit 30, 53/39T, 170mm (XS/S), 172.5mm (M), 175mm (L/XL)
Profile Design T2+ S-bend extensions with Air Wing base bar, 400mm (XS/S/M), 420mm (L/XL)
Profile Design Aris, 3D forged 6061 alloy, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 80mm (XS), 90mm (S/M), 100mm (L/XL)
Jamis Aero carbon post with integrated seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza TT with Syntex + Kev cover and carbon steel rails
